CORRIGENDUM
(Reference:
AVSEC Circular
No. 20/2004 dated 27/09/2004)
Subject:
Security
of courier
bags
and
unaccompanied
consignments
forwarded
by courier companies
In partial modification to AVSEC Circular No. 20/2004
dated 27/09/2004,
Point No.6 of the Annexure-A to this Circular which reads as under:
6. Electronic
items,
Televisions,
VCRs,
VCPs,
Radios,
Transistors,
Computers parts, Calculators, Transformers, Alarm Clocks etc.
is hereby deleted.
